citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a documented enrichment plan for birds. Birds have complex social and environmental needs;
failure to meet these needs can result in stress, obesity, or the development of abnormal/harmful behaviors. Correct by
12/2/23 by documenting an enrichment plan for birds to include all of the elements required by the Animal Welfare Act
regulations.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility does not have a documented enrichment plan for birds. Birds have complex social and environmental needs; 
failure to meet these needs can result in stress, obesity, or the development of abnormal/harmful behaviors. Correct by 
12/2/23 by documenting an enrichment plan for birds to include all of the elements required by the Animal Welfare Act 
regulations. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
